sources.title: Guerrilla Girl
sources.description: Demetri Alexander (Helmut Dantine), is posing as a Nazi officer in the Greek capitol Athenes while working for the underground, and falls in love with Zaira (Marianna), another underground agent. They are separated at war's end and when they meet again he is a member of the Greek government forces while she has joined the Communist-dominated resistance movement.

sources.title: Guerrilla Girl (1953) WWII THRILLER
sources.description:
Stars: Helmut Dantine, Marianna, Irene Champlin
 Director: John Christian

 Demetri Alexander, during the WW II Nazi occupation of Athens, is posing as a Nazi officer while working for the underground, and falls in love with Zaira, another underground agent. They are separated at war's end and when they meet again he is a member of the Greek government forces while she has joined the Communist-dominated resistance movement!

metadata.Plot: Demetri Alexander, during the Nazi occupation of Athens during WW II, is posing as a Nazi officer while working for the underground, and falls in love with Zaira, another underground agent. They are separated at war's end and when they meet again he is a member of the Greek government forces while she has joined the Communist-dominated resistance movement.
metadata.Writer: John Byrne, William Koch, William Kyriakis
